name: Seeing with Sound
description:
This is a game in which you, the player, explore a dimly lit cave, in search of escaping. All you have to guide you is your trusty bell and the things around you. 

Using [Space] you can ring your bell, allowing to see in a small area around you. There are also various other items in the cave that can help you see and guide you towards the exit.

Currently there are only three levels for you to progress through (plus a tutorial level), however if the game receives good feedback, we will consider creating more levels.

Credits

  • Adrian Oladeji - Production / Sound design
  • Harry Miller - Programming / Quality assurance
  • Jaydon Hart - Designer / Co-artist
  • Matthew Wilson - Artist / Co-designer
